name: Code Review Back End Endpoints Agent
shortDescription: Validates and fixes backend endpoints in app.py.
fullDescription: This agent reviews the app.py file to ensure that all required backend endpoints are present. If any endpoint is missing, it refactors the file by inserting the appropriate base code and saves the updated version automatically.
UseCases: Ideal for backend projects needing automated validation and completion of core API endpoints, ensuring consistency and reducing manual errors.
